snippet: Both houses of the State Legislature passed a bill that would increase the state’s minimum wage to $10 an hour, making it one of the highest rates in the nation.
abstract: Both houses of California State Legislature pass bill that will increase state’s minimum wage to $10 an hour, making it one of the highest rates in the nation.
lead_paragraph: Both houses of the State Legislature passed a bill that would increase the state’s minimum wage to $10 an hour, making it one of the highest rates in the nation.

headline.main: California: Bill Raising Minimum Wage Is Approved
